list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the convex bone in front of the knee joint; the patella.
shoot (someone) in the knee or leg as a form of punishment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: petty crimes are punished by kneecapping
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tội ác nhỏ bị trừng phạt bằng cách cheo mắt
